title: Instructional Design Process for Formative Assessment in Advanced Mathematics Based on Cognitive Apprenticeship Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math concepts and statistical analysis capabilities
context.additional_context: Strengthening advanced mathematics application skills in VR simulation environments to improve workplace efficiency for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can apply advanced mathematics concepts (calculus, probability) with 80% accuracy to solve real-world problems presented in VR simulation environments.
Learners can improve weekly learning outcomes by 15% or more through formative assessments utilizing digital note-taking features.
Learners can revise problem-solving processes three or more times based on peer evaluations and instructor feedback to finalize deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
